attributes.action: reveal peadophiles identity and addresses to protect our children
attributes.additional_details: peadophiles seem to have more human rights than our children they should not have protection as the day they touch a child they should lose all rights. us parents should be able to know who to keep our kids away from and where our children must avoid. Children are vulnerable and a peadophile is no better than a murderer the child will live with the abuse forever.
